name: Minaret Builder
description:
Drop tower segments and stack them to form a minaret as tall as possible.

Made by Johannes Larsson and Sante Larsson for Arabic Game Jam 2015.

Music:
Naraina by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Source code for the java/libGDX version is on github.
